ai: What is love? Baby don't hurt me, don't hurt me, no more! WHAT IS LOVE!?

a: The poem's a bit longer, but     we're prepared!
Ready? Bring us to tears, bread  eater!
This is the official demo of     Polcompistan High: Love Story!
If you spot any glitches or have any recommendations,
please let us know in the        Polcompistan discord server.
al: However, if this is your first   time,
I should notify you that there’s much more to this game.
You picked MECH this time. Why   not choose to research with      ERWIN?
You chose to reject MECH when youfound out she was cheating; what if you didn’t?
Point is, there’s quite a bit    here.
Even if you don’t continue       playing, I have one more thing tosay.
From me, and everyone on my team:
am: However, if this is your first   time,
I should notify you that there’s much more to this game.
You picked MECH this time. Why   not choose to research with      ERWIN?
You chose to stay with MECH--    what if you were to reject her?
Point is, there’s quite a bit    here.
Even if you don’t continue       playing, I have one more thing tosay.
From me, and everyone on my team:
Oh yeah and get a life you cuck
an: However, if this is your first   time,
I should notify you that there’s much more to this game.
You picked ERWIN this time. Why  not choose to research with      MECH?
You chose to go out with MITSUU  this time;
what if you went to check up on  ERWIN your next playthrough?
Point is, there’s quite a bit    here.
Even if you don’t continue       playing, I have one more thing tosay.
From me, and everyone on my team:
ao: However, if this is your first   time,
I should notify you that there’s much more to this game.
You picked ERWIN this time. Why  not choose to research with      MECH?
You chose to deny MITSUU’s offer to go on a date;
Point is, there’s quite a bit    here.
Even if you don’t continue       playing, I have one more thing tosay.
From me, and everyone on my team:
aL: Hey kids, it's your friendly neighborhood felon
Can I be in the game?
Why does gen 8 suck so bad?
]: It has been 2 weeks since the endof the Science Fair.
MITSUU and ERWIN have become     quite the popular couple;
MOSS, MECH, and bread eater are  as happy as can be.
Oh, hello, MOSS. MECH. How art   thou?
Heya, MITSUU. I’m pretty good    myself.
You know, me and ERWIN are       looking into becoming the PolCutecouple of the year.
I’ve heard rumors about a gift   card to a high-end restaurant    downtown being the prize.
I’m sorry, but what in the world is a “PolCute Couple?”
The PolCute competition is where different couples all gather in  one place to see who’s the best.
It consists of three different   categories that each party must  complete,
and whoever racks up the most    points at the end is deemed      “PolCute Couple of the Year”.
Hey, you guys should go for it!  Just don’t let it go to your     heads.
DUMMY! We’re not OBSESSED with   ourselves!!
B-but it would be nice to go     somewhere fancy.
W-well, good luck to you two!
(A good reminder that MITSUU and ERWIN are perfect for each       other.)
Anyway, we gotta go. We’ve got a double date with KAS and TAILS,  didn’t you know?
Wow, K-KAS and TAILS?? I didn’t  know you guys were THAT cool.
Calm down, kitten-- She didn’t   mean it like that.
You need to stop using tweetzler all the time. I think it’s       melting your brain.
We should probably get out of    here ourselves.
Trve… I have a heap of pre-calc  homework to finish by tomorrow,  anyway.
aq: [MOSS gets home and works on his assignments till late evening.
He finishes the last question in the unit, when…]
uuuuugh, I’m so bored -.- do u   wanna talk 4 a while?
so… what’s smth u’ve never told  any1 b4? like a secret.
I’ve always thought MITSUU was   kinda pretty~
(MITSUU too? How many boys do youneed?)
One of my favorite things to do  online is spam furry music videosin random forums.
I have a furaffinity account and everything.
Indeed. It’s quite humorous to   see how users react.
(Yeah, humor. That’s definitely  why you do it.)
this CAN’T leave the group chat, but…
I guess I know what to send u,   then~
[MECH types for a second, then   stops. The chat dies for a few   minutes.]
I WAS SHARINGH THE OIUCBYR OF MY FT WHN I SNR T TO RWON
I have literally no idea what youjust said.
I ACCIDENTALLY SENT ERWIN MY FEETPICS!!
I WAS GOING TO TAP SHARE AND SENDIT THRU MESSENGER
BUT THEN MY FINGER SLIPPED AND I SENT IT TO ERWIN’S NUMBER ON     ACCIDENT
well, can you unsend the message?
THIS ISN’T DISCORD IT DOESN’T    WORK LIKE THAT
take a deep breath, it’s fine.
we’ll just ask ERWIN to delete   the photo in class tomorrow.
[MECH types for a second, and    then stops once again. It seems  the conversation has concluded.]
I’m really tired. The lesson on  parabolas really took a toll on  my brain power.
He gets under the covers and     drifts off to sleep peacefully.]
ar: OH HEY, IT’S MY FAVORITE FOOT    MODEL--
SHHHH! We don’t need everyone    else in the class to hear.
If you could maybe d-delete thoseimages you're laughing at?
WHAT DO YOU THINK DUMBASS!? MECH SENT ME FEET PICS!!
Yeah, and? It was by accident.   Delete them, please.
[MITSUU’s eyes suddenly light up.He whispers something into       ERWIN’s ear.]
Maybe I won’t, come to think of  it.
Tell you what. I’ll delete them  if you do something for US.
(This is such an ERWIN move. You think you’re friends with him,
then he pulls some shit like thisjust because he has the upper    hand.)
We really wanna win that PolCute couple of the year. But there’s  some stiff competition.
Remember how we went to hang out with KAS and TAILS?
Weeeeelll, They’re gonna enter,  too. And it REALLY pisses me     off!!
So, if you can sabotage them,    I’ll delete your pics.
Well, there’s three parts to     PolCute.
The first part is Beauty-- TAILS is well known for his buff       brazilian body.
Why can’t you be toned like that?
Basically, we have to recite lovepoems to our partner in a        romantic way.
MECH, you have Literature class  with KAS, right?
So, what, are they just good     kissers or something?
No, it’s just that ERWIN doesn’t like kissing in front of other   people.
Anyway, if you guys can find a   way to lessen their strengths andboost ours,
we’ll pretend like this whole    fiasco never happened.
MOSS… I don’t know how we’re     gonna pull off something like    this.
…ERWIN. I have a proposition for you.
We’ll ENTER the competition      ourselves. As a trio.
Pffft! A TRIO?? This is a contestfor COUPLES, brainlet!
You’re gonna read poems to each  other and have a group kiss??    There’s no chance you’d win.
Besides, there’s like 3 days leftbefore it happens, anyway.
If we DO win your precious       PolCute thing, you gotta delete  what MECH sent you.
But only because we know you’ll  LOSE.
I think you’ll find you          underestimated us. We’ll catch   you guys later.
Buh-bye, MOSS and friends. See   you on the playing field.
as: [MOSS, bread eater and MECH go tosign up after school.]
Woops, did I catch you off guard?
Hello, we’d like to enter into   the PolCute competition.
You guys waited until the last   minute? Aight.
Well, which two of you wanna     participate?
We’re signing up as a threesome.
Can you please make an exception for us? We HAVE to be in this    thing.
I’ll go get our event planner.   He can tell you what he told me.
[Wyrm enters a door. Conversationcan be heard.]
Is that the dumpster fire who    tried to ask me out? HA!
What do you guys want? I’m real  busy right now, so cut to the    chase.
(There’s no way we can enter     now…)
Heh. I see what’s going on now.
You know who MITSUU is, right?
He DMed me earlier saying that heneeded a favor.
He wanted you guys to be allowed into the contest.
Well, are you gonna let us in or what?
MITSUU and I are pretty solid,
and I’m only doing this stupid   shit for my college application  anyway, so…
Write your names down and get outof my face.
You guys fit together like a     freak show anyway, so it’s not   like you’d win.
[MOSS writes their names down on the sign up sheet.]
All signed up? Great, now get thefuck out.
at: The trio’s preparing for the     PolCute contest.
…I think we’ve got it all figuredout.
There’s three categories--       Fashion, Eloquence, and Kissing.
I’ll be the first, dancing for   the Fashion category;
bread eater will be second,      thanks to his buttery smooth     voice;
and, since you two insisted on   it,
You will kiss for the third      category.
Y-yeah! I’ll enjoy practicing on bread eater for the next three   days~!
Remember, we have extra manpower.Three is better than two.
If we play our cards right, we’llbe unstoppable!
But, before getting overly       confident, we need to practice.
Let’s figure out the Fashion     stuff today, and work on the     Eloquence tomorrow.
We get to dress you up~? Okay!!
Well, what are we waiting for?   Let’s get started!
av: Look at my handsome man! All     dressed up~
Quite sharp, indeed. Now, let’s  see here…
in the Fashion category, you’ll  have to dance to a certain song.
This is a music game. It says    here,
to tap “SPACE” when the note     matches with the outline at the  end as accurately as possible.
Don't miss too many times, or    you'll lose.
au: PolCute, numero dos. Let’s crush this.
in the Eloquence category, you’llhave to read out a poem with     romantic expression.
This game is a bullet hell.
It says here, you will move the  heart around with the “ARROW”    keys,
dodging the mess-ups without     running into them too many times.
Your score is determined by how  many bullets you hit.
aw: in the Kissing category, the pairwill have to get in an intense   smooch session.
You’re gonna need fast fingers   for this one.
It says here, when the timer     begins,
you’ll have 10 seconds to tap the“SPACEBAR” as many times as you  can to rack up points.
It is recommended to use 2 or    four fingers, tapping rapidly.
ax: It appears we have finished our  preparations.
Remember, the practice is easier than the live performance;
if we need to train a little     more, we should do it now.
(Huh. Do we need more practice,  or are we good to go?)
It’s about time we show those twothat they shouldn’t mess with us!
ay: How to play the Fashion game:
Tap "SPACE" when the notes match with the outline at the end as   accurately as possible.
Don't miss too many times, or    you'll lose.
^: How to play the Eloquence game:
Move the heart with the "ARROW"  keys, making sure not to get hit.
Your score is based on your finalHP or total time depending on    your survival.
az: How to play the Kissing game:
You’ll have 10 seconds to tap the“SPACEBAR” as many times as you  can to rack up points.
It is recommended to use 2 or    four fingers, tapping rapidly.
aA: and I’m here with Mr. SURGEON,
who'll determine the next PolCutecouple of the year!
I’ve seen many relationships in  my time here at Polcompistan     High,
and I was elected into this      special position by the          leadership class.
It's an honor to do this, and I  wish you all good luck!
Known as the “Crazy Couple” by   many, they’re not afraid to do   what it takes to win!
Known as the “Classic Couple”,   they’ve been together for 4 yearsnow.
That dedication is gonna be hard to top!
their individuality and          expression is below no other!
They’ve been the talk of the     school ever since they fell in   love.
Oh, don’t forget about MITSUU andERWIN!
Although their relationship was  formed only recently,
that doesn’t stop the “Clever    Couple” from dominating the rest.
And last, but not least, we have…
MECH, MOSS, and bread eater are  all fairly unknown,
but that won’t waver their       determination.
Their technique is sure to be    planned out,
as they know the competition was intended for duos.
Let’s get to what we’ve all been waiting for.
Without further ado, PolCute     begins now!
aB: Recall the practice. Try as best as you can!
Ready? Show us your moves, MOSS!
aC: The poem's a bit longer, but     we're prepared!
Ready? Bring us to tears, bread  eater!
aD: This is it. Don't let the        pressure get to you!
After this, MECH will be safe    from humiliation!
You guys ready? The audience     certainly is!
_: Welp, that’s all of the          categories!
It seems that the "underdogs",   MOSS, MECH, and bread eater, haveemerged victorious!
Is this the end of this year's   PolCute...?
I think you forgot about         something.
Oh, I didn’t forget, I just      didn’t mention it.
we’ve decided to do something    we’ve never done before.
to decide if there should be a   sudden-death round for the top 2 couples.
Since our top 2 are MITSUU-ERWIN and MOSS-MECH-bread eater--
they’ll have to go face-to-face  in tug-o-war!
This is for all the marbles, so  you’d better hope your strategy  is fine-tuned!
O-oh my… We never prepared for   this!
Tug-o-war is a game about        manpower, and who has more of it?
Well, it looks like you guys win this one…
You would’ve been number 1 if youdidn’t try to play games with us.
B-but, we tried so hard to win.
I don’t know why we’re in second place…
…MITSUU and I have been          practicing ever since the sign-  ups were available for PolCute.
We were so determined to win the prize, and get put in the        yearbook as a couple.
It was gonna be super special forus.
Something we could look back on  and smile,
even if we weren’t together by   then.
It was gonna be the highlight of our high school career.
I’ll delete the pics and         everything…
…A-anyway, just make it quick. Weknow you’ll easily beat us.
…I know they threatened us and   everything, but I kinda feel bad…
I never wanted to start trouble  with them--
And now they’re gonna lose       something they were really       looking forward to.
How important are those feet picsif they got leaked to the rest ofthe school?
W-well, not as important as      PolCute is to ERWIN and MITSUU, Iguess.
Then I know what to do.
Just follow my lead when we’re   playing tug-o-war, okay?
Do what your heart desires, MOSS.
Alright, ladies and gentlemen!   It's time for sudden-death!
[The game begins, as the crowd   watches intently.
MITSUU and ERWIN only give a     little pull on the rope. They’re prepared to lose.
But, shockingly, this was enough to launch MOSS, MECH, and bread  eater forward.
ERWIN looks up with wide eyes.   He’s wondering what’s going on.
At that moment, MOSS gave a      little wink.
MITSUU caught light of what was  going on.
He murmured something to ERWIN,  and they both began to tug as    hard as they could.
MOSS fell forward, and the rest  of the trio followed suit.
Just as they hit the ground,
the heart at the end of the rope came out of the center circle,
in favor of the other team.
MOSS had let ERWIN and MITSUU    win.]
[The audience cheered as they hadseen who was still standing.]
At a stunning turn of events,
it appears MITSUU and ERWIN      mustered up the strength to      defeat the competition!
I think it’s obvious to say that ERWIN and MITSUU are the next    PolCute couple of the year!
Come up here to retrieve your    prize, and get your photo taken!
[As the couple came up to get    their reward, the theatre had    started to empty.
MOSS, MECH, and bread eater standnearby and talk for a minute,
Thank MECH, she’s the one who    thought we should let you have   your memory.
I… I don’t really care if you    show people the pictures of my   feet.
What you guys did was super nice and stuff.
I mean, if you won I would have  had to get rid of them, I guess.
[ERWIN opens up his message      history, and goes to delete the  photos.
Right when he’s about to press   the button,
we hear some snickering coming   from the seats of the theatre.]
Why the hell did you send me footpics? You’re so weird!!
Hey bby~ my name’s Mech, UwU!1!1!
I think you’re cute, so I sent   yuo my super cute feetsies teehee
D-did you send everyone MECH’s   feet!?
MITSUU, you DUMBASS! I told you  that Spingle: The Movie magnet   link wasn’t safe,
but you insisted I download it!!
Guys, I think someone hacked intomy phone.
W-well, I guess I’ll be          humiliated until I graduate…
[ERWIN snaps a photo of his own  feet from several angles.
He opens up his email app and    makes a message out to everyone  in the school’s network.]
“Hey guys, I’m feeling kinda wildafter winning PolCute of the     year.
I think you should see a little  more of me~!”
ERWIN… You don’t have to do this…
[ERWIN enthusiastically taps     “send”. The deed is done.]
If deleting your pics won’t      change a thing, then I’ll do     something that will!
You’re my friend, MECH. That’s   what friends do.
I guess we can say goodbye to ourpopularity.
We’ve got 3 other people to hang out with anyway.
We might not be able to get the  filet mignon,
but if we all order some         appetizers,
we should be able to cover the   cost on the gift card.
Let’s get going then. The day’s  not growing any younger!
And so, the Foot Pic Fiasco has  come to a conclusion.
Though they had an altercation inthe beginning,
they learned that everyone can   win if they just sacrificed a    little.
But can we take a minute to talk about what ERWIN just did?
Like that’s fuckin crazy he just went down and dirty and now      everyone’s seen his shit.
Okay that's the end buh-bye back to the main menu

Maybe if we try a little harder, we can still win this thing!
That was wild, I might need a    minute to recover!

Serves ERWIN and MITSUU right.
Second place at that, what a slapin the face!

It looks like we didn’t stand a  chance against MITSUU and ERWIN.
I’m sorry, MECH.
[As the threesome lost against   MITSUU and ERWIN,

Would you like to try again?
